title: IPL Scoreboard
text: May 10, 2018 / 5:55 PM / Updated 40 minutes ago IPL Scoreboard Reuters Staff 2 Min Read May 10 (OPTA) - Scoreboard at close of play on the first day of match 42 between Delhi Daredevils and Sunrisers Hyderabad on Thursday at Delhi, India Sunrisers Hyderabad win by 9 wickets Delhi Daredevils 1st innings Prithvi Shaw c Shikhar Dhawan b Shakib Al Hasan 9 Jason Roy c Shreevats Goswami b Shakib Al Hasan 11 Shreyas Iyer Run Out Shreevats Goswami 3 Rishabh Pant Not Out 128 Harshal Patel Run Out Shreevats Goswami 24 Glenn Maxwell c Alex Hales b Bhuvneshwar Kumar 9 Extras 0b 2lb 0nb 0pen 1w 3 Total (20.0 overs) 187-5 Fall of Wickets : 1-21 Shaw, 2-21 Roy, 3-43 Iyer, 4-98 Patel, 5-161 Maxwell Did Not Bat : Shankar, Plunkett, Nadeem, Mishra, Boult Bowling Ov Md Rn Wk Econ Ex Bhuvneshwar Kumar 4 0 51 1 12.75 1w Sandeep Sharma 4 0 24 0 6.00 Shakib Al Hasan 4 0 27 2 6.75 Siddarth Kaul 4 0 48 0 12.00 Rashid Khan 4 0 35 0 8.75 Sunrisers Hyderabad 1st innings Alex Hales lbw Harshal Patel 14 Shikhar Dhawan Not Out 92 Kane Williamson Not Out 83 Extras 0b 1lb 0nb 0pen 1w 2 Total (18.5 overs) 191-1 Fall of Wickets : 1-15 Hales Did Not Bat : Al Hasan, Pandey, Pathan, Khan, Goswami, Kumar, Kaul, Sharma Bowling Ov Md Rn Wk Econ Ex Trent Boult 3.5 0 43 0 11.22 Harshal Patel 4 0 32 1 8.00 Shahbaz Nadeem 2 0 22 0 11.00 Liam Plunkett 4 0 41 0 10.25 Amit Mishra 3 0 29 0 9.67 Vijay Shankar 1 0 14 0 14.00 1w Glenn Maxwell 1 0 9 0 9.00 Umpire Anil Dandekar Umpire Chettithody Shamsuddin Video Sundaram Ravi Match Referee Manu Nayyar
